INTEREST.name: Interest Monthly Rate :
INTEREST.help: Flat interest to be used in simulation cost of interest

HOUSE_PRICE.name: House Price :
HOUSE_PRICE.help: The current price of the house interested on

HOUSE_PRICE_GROWTH.name: House Price Monthly Growth:
HOUSE_PRICE_GROWTH.help: The average Monthly growth of house prices. Default for Auckland, NZ Region taken from the historical of past 10+ years:  https://www.barfoot.co.nz/market-reports/2024/may/residential-sales-report

INSTALLMENT_THRESH.name: Installment Upper Limit on Mortgage :
INSTALLMENT_THRESH.help: The upper price capable of paying should a mortgage be acquire

RENT_PRICE.name: Rent Price :
RENT_PRICE.help: The current paid rent price. This will be used as the cost to save money for a Mortgage

RENT_GROWTH.name: Rent Prices Monthly Growth :
RENT_GROWTH.help: The Monthly grow on rent prices. Default for Auckland, NZ Region taken from the historical of past 10+ years: StatsNZ

INITIAL_SAVINGS.name: Current Savings :
INITIAL_SAVINGS.help: The current savings that will be destined for the down payment of the house

SAVINGS_PER_MONTH.name: Monthly Savings :
SAVINGS_PER_MONTH.help: The amount to be save monthly for putting the initial payment of the house

SAVINGS_GROWTH.name: Saving Monthly Growth :
SAVINGS_GROWTH.help: The interest paid over the savings. Default for the S&P500 over 5+ years
